## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install bloggy in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure bloggy package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to bloggy
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/sizhky/bloggy):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/sizhky/bloggy.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/sizhky/bloggy)

``` sh
$ conda install -c sizhky bloggy
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/bloggy/)

``` sh
$ pip install bloggy
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/sizhky/bloggy)’s
[pages](https://sizhky.github.io/bloggy/). Additionally you can find
package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/sizhky/bloggy) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/bloggy/) respectively.
